'''''Eternal Sun, Eternal Want''''' is the second [[Natlan]] Chapter [[soundtrack]].

It features a total of 53 soundtracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team, each one original compositions for Natlan.

The album was first announced on December 15, 2024 alongside the tracklist on Weibo and the album was released on December 16.<ref>Sina Weibo: [https://weibo.com/6593199887/P56OjvuP5 {{zh|亲爱的旅行者，《原神》第二张纳塔篇OST「遥古喁望之阳 Eternal Sun, Eternal Want」现已正式上线。}}]</ref>
